# psychduck

This is a collections of miscellaneous functions created by students and faculty in the [Department of Psychology](https://psychology.uoregon.edu/) at [University of Oregon](https://www.uoregon.edu/). 

Updates, clean-up, and additions are welcome by anyone wishing to contribute. 

To install, you will need the "devtools" package installed before downloading from GitHub. **Requires R version 3.5 or higher.**
```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

# Requires devtools package
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("robchavez/psychduck")
```
